StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [InsertOrUpdateFYNumVisits]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CollegeVisitDetailID uniqueiden..er, @CollegePro.leID uniqueiden..er, @NumFYPlannedVisits smallint, @NumFYContractGoal smallint, @UserLogin varchar(50)
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
IF EXISTS (SELECT '1' from [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] cvd where [CollegeVisitDetailID] = @CollegeVisitDetailID ) -- then update the exisi.ng record BEGIN
UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] SET [NumVisitsPlanned] = @NumFYPlannedVisits, [ContractGoal]= @NumFYContractGoal, [UserLogin] = @UserLogin, [UpdateDate] = GetDate() WHERE [CollegeVisitDetailID] = @CollegeVisitDetailID
END
-- then insert ELSE BEGIN
INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[CollegeVisitDetail] ([CollegeVisitDetailID] ,[CollegePro.leID] , [NumVisitsPlanned] ,[ContractGoal] ,[UserLogin] ,[UpdateDate])
Values(@CollegeVisitDetailID, @CollegePro.leID, @NumFYPlannedVisits, @NumFYContractGoal, @UserLogin, GetDate()) END --- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
